title: Pattu Vanna Selaithan Lyrics Muthal Seethanam
stanzas:
Pattu vanna selaithan
muthu mani maalaithaan
rathinangal nooruthaan
katti vacha theruthaan

aval kanasaithaal
mazhai kaalam varum.
idhal punnagaithaal
adhil poo malarum

mayilinangal mayangividum
mangai ival nadaiyinile
andha kuyilinangal
thavam irukkum
konjum ival kuralile

mugam oru thamarai
idhal oru maadhuzhai
ivaloru poo mazhaiye

naan idhuvarai kandathil
azhagiya pengalil
ival pol kaanalaye

padaithavanum malaithuvidum
paruvam indha pagal nila
indha pani malarin
manam kulira nadatha
vandhen thiruvizha

azhaguku ilakkanam
adhil oru thalaikanam
adhai konjam aalakkanume
